data.title: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum Wiki
authors: Contributors to Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum Wiki
data.meta_site_name: Xavier Riddle and the Secret Museum Wiki
data.text:
Sir Charles Spencer Chaplin KBE was an English comic actor, filmmaker, and composer who rose to fame in the era of silent film. He became a worldwide icon through his screen persona, "The Tramp", and is considered one of the most important figures in the history of the film industry.

He appeared on an episode called I Am Charlie Chaplin.

Since he was met in 1894, he would have been 5 years old when the trio met him.

He is voiced by Ian Ho.

Chaplin worked on movies from 1914 until 1967. Brad comments "Charlie made movies a hundred years ago" which establishes it being later than 2013.

Appearance[]

Trivia[]

Chaplin met Helen Keller, but the series hasn't made reference to that.[1]

References[]
